keywords.indexterm: Reviewer GuideSharing tasks with other Reviewers

body.p:
As the Reviewer, to share your created tasks with other Reviewers, follow these steps:
Use the link that was sent by the Content Author to open the interface in your default browser.
Copy the URL in the browser.
Open your email or whatever electronic messaging system your organization uses, paste the copied URL, and send it to the other Reviewers that you want to look at the documents.
